full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify for Marine Construction Services in Sandford, Nova Scotia
#### Solicitation Number: WS4337915718

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), invites qualified suppliers to submit a bid for the modification of the existing rubblemound breakwater in Sandford, Nova Scotia.

#### Tender Description

The work required consists of furnishing all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and materials to complete the project. The estimated value for the contract falls within the range of $1,000,001 to $5,000,000.

#### Delivery Schedule and Bid Requirements

Delivery of the project is expected to commence within 12 weeks of contract award. Bidders are required to provide a bid security as part of their submission. This solicitation is the second phase of the procurement process, following an invitation to qualify, and is restricted to qualified suppliers who have been invited to participate.

#### Contracting Entity and End-User

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC), and the end-user is the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFOP) based in Ottawa, Ontario.

#### Contact Information

Adam Beaumaster, representing PWGSC, can be contacted at:

adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
(Suppliers are responsible for technology-enabled services costs)

#### Reference Information

* Solicitation Reference Number: WS4337915718-Doc4395077331
* Amendment Number: 1
* Published Date: January 15, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: January 31, 2024, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)

### Important Information

This solicitation falls under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is restricted to suppliers who are in compliance with this agreement.

The procurement method employed is competitive selective tendering, and the selection criteria is based on the lowest price. Suppliers must submit their bids in accordance with the requirements outlined in the tender documents.

### Brief Details of Works

The rubblemound breakwater repair in Sandford, Nova Scotia, requires only qualified bidders in the prescribed categories to be eligible to qualify for tender invitation.
- Delivery Date of the Project is to be _12 weeks after award_ of the contract
- A **Paiement Confirmation Payment/Security bid Polymer** must be introduced for the provision of payment merchant services, tool fabrication mobile no control portopiuble fast
